ReportText: EXAM: CHEST RADIOGRAPHY EXAM DATE: 05/07/2020 11:05 AM. CLINICAL HISTORY: Pneumonia. COMPARISON: XR CHEST 1 VIEW AP/PA 05/03/2020 7:41 PM. TECHNIQUE: 1 view. FINDINGS: Lungs/Pleura: Lung volumes are low. There is increased mild patchy opacity at the left lung base. No pleural effusion or pneumothorax. Mediastinum: Within exam limitations, the cardiomediastinal contour is normal. Other: No acute osseous abnormality. IMPRESSION: Low lung volumes. Increased mild patchy opacity at the left lung base may represent atelectasis or pneumonia.
